title: E64 Father Bob and Wronger Answers
description:
Em covers the insanely haunted Borley Rectory, which is haunted by a nun, some headless horsemen, and a guy who was not only extra - he was 1863 extra. Meanwhile, Christine goes for a ~theme~ and covers three crazy locked room mysteries. Oh and if you wanna join our mahjong ring, let us know. 
CrimeCon Meetup: 
Broadway Brewhouse Midtown on Saturday May 5th at 8pm Central Time
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Kast Media)
